message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
